anathema: Despoil nature, kill a natural plant or animal that has managed to thrive outside of its intended environment
edict: Manipulate dangerous beings and opportunities to your benefit, thrive in hostile conditions, divine the future

<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Erecura (Queen of Dis)](/Deities.aspx?ID=564)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 318

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Manipulate dangerous beings and opportunities to your benefit, thrive in hostile conditions, divine the future

**Anathema** Despoil nature, kill a natural plant or animal that has managed to thrive outside of its intended environment

**Area of Concern**
Deduction, mind reading, subtlety

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Wisdom or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** none

**Divine Skill** [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38)

**Favored Weapon** [Light Mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=360)

**Domains** [Fate](/Domains.aspx?ID=75), [Secrecy](/Domains.aspx?ID=91), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=94), [Truth](/Domains.aspx?ID=95)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Anticipate Peril](/Spells.aspx?ID=2343)

- **2nd**
[Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=1577)

- **5th**
[Subconscious Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=1692)

</column>
name: Erecura (Queen of Dis)
